name: One More Dance
description:
Prom night is tonight, but there's a problem: As a recently reanimated undead, your clothes are torn and you're not in any shape to get your groove on. Go through a few action-packed levels as you try to find the missing pieces to your prom night before you're taken down!

Credits:

- Programming and design by JungaBoon

- Additional programming by Callum

- Models by Curtis

- Music by Brian

- Sound Effects by Caleb

- Additional voices by Hannah
